product.longDescription: Medium-large 3- and 4-lobed fruits are blocky to slightly elongated. The flavor is both fruity and sweet. A few days earlier than Flavorburst, Sweet Sunrise has a sturdier, medium-size plant with better leaf cover. Yields well and fruits ripen early, even in the North. Bred by Janika Eckert. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 5,200 seeds/oz. Packet: 25 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Blocky, dark green bell ripens to yellow/orange.
